name: Deep Sea Scuttle
description:
Deep Sea Scuttle is a 1v1 local multiplayer race to treasure island! Angle your sails into the wind, load and fire the cannons, steer your ship away from rocks, and repair holes in your ship to ensure you get to the gold first!  

Player 1 Keyboard Controls:

WASD to move, Space to interact.  

Player 2 Keyboard Controls:

Arrow Keys to move, Left Control to interact.  

Xbox/PlayStation Controller Controls:

Left joystick to move, XBOX A or PlayStation X to interact
